title: Technical Teardown:  ROTOR 2InPower Crankset 30mm
content: Introduction One viewer of the Hambini YouTube channel sent in a bike for service and a new bottom bracket. This bike was fitted with a Rotor power meter crankset. In the process of making a new BB for this bike, the rotor crankset was measured and checked. This post covers the engineering and a general [â€¦]
